entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High minus 16.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High minus 16. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 23. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing late this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill near minus 33. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. Temperature falling to minus 29 in the afternoon.
